author: ate
msg: JS2-871 - Upgrade Pluto container to version 2.0
- big jump to align to the latest changes in Pluto: now we no longer need to implement/provide the runtime registry features Pluto Portal Driver uses.
- also some small assembly and OJB mapping fixes
- also updated the demo deployment configuration
- building and demo deploy now work again!
- startup yet is failing currently (some outstanding assembly configuration issues)

author: ate
msg: Adding a new optional container service: PortletContextService
This contains the *runtime* registration methods moved from PortletRegistryService.
As Jetspeed has its own way of handling this, those methods were causing many difficulties to adapt to, so I refactored then as a separate service which Jetspeed simply does *not* implement.
The only usage of this service is within:
- PortletServlet (Jetspeed has its own/different JetspeedContainerServlet and will remain using it)
- PortletWindowThread, getting access to the portlet application classLoader (this is Portal Driver only)

author: wsmoak
msg: [CONTINUUM-1953] Add a test to show that build definition templates are ignored
